body_content.explanation: a customer who wants to buy very high-quality technical products or equipment. The word is formed from the words "professional" and "consumer":
examples: The company offers a more sophisticated solution, aimed at prosumers and professionals.
The cost of a DSLR is still considerably higher than that of a prosumer camera.

body_content.explanation: a customer who helps a company design and produce its products. The word is formed from the words "producer" and "consumer":
examples: The passive consumer is being replaced by the "prosumer" who will participate in the design and creation of products.
The word consumer is outdated and should be replaced by the more pro-active "prosumer".
